author: Rob Price, Business Insider UK
title: Someone in 2010 bought 2 pizzas with 10,000 bitcoins — which today would be worth $20 million

author: Rob Price
title: Someone in 2010 bought 2 pizzas with 10,000 bitcoins — which today would be worth $20 million

author: Lucinda Shen
description: It's the seventh anniversary of the first bitcoin purchase
title: If You Bought $5 of Bitcoin 7 Years Ago, You’d Be $4.4 Million Richer

author: Jon Russell, Fitz Tepper
description: The world’s most popular cryptocurrency is now worth over $2,000 per coin.  That’s according to a range of bitcoin exchanges, including Coinbase and..
title: Bitcoin just surged past $2,000 for the first time

author: Carla Neuhaus
description: Bitcoins sind derzeit so teuer wie nie. Experten sehen diesen Kursanstieg kritisch. Sie fürchten eine Blasenbildung.
title: Was hinter dem Kursanstieg der Bitcoins steckt

author: Frank Wiebe
description: Die Kryptowährung Bitcoin gewinnt rasant an Wert und durchbricht die 2.000-Dollar-Marke. Kritiker und Insider warnen vor einer Blase. Doch der Begeisterung der Investoren tut das keinen Abbruch.
title: Bitcoins  im Höhenflug: Völlig losgelöst im Cyberspace

author: Evelyn Cheng
description: Bitcoin climbed above $2,000 for the first time Saturday on increased demand from Japanese and Chinese investors.
title: Bitcoin taps fresh record highs amid rising demand from Japan, China

author: Arjun Kharpal
description: Bitcoin hit a fresh record high above $2,100 on Monday with the cryptocurrency continuing its strong rally.
title: If you bought $100 of bitcoin 7 years ago, you'd be sitting on $75 million now

author: Evelyn Cheng
description: Bitcoin added more than $200 Monday as major U.S. financial institutions warmed to the digital currency.
title: Bitcoin jumps $200 in single day and has nearly doubled in May on surging global demand

author: Jörn Brien
description: Die Digitalwährung Bitcoin eilt von Allzeithoch zu Allzeithoch. Am Samstag wurde erstmals die wichtige Marke von 2.000 US-Dollar geknackt. Ein Ende des Booms ist derzeit nicht abzusehen.
title: Bitcoin knackt 2.000 Dollar: Darum boomt die Kryptowährung jetzt
